ygData.subject: Re: Stein of Moggok Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: You are right, I checked it last night. Not no-drop, but Lore. Wow, it s only selling for about 150-200PP on Fennin. I tried to /auction last night and no
ygData.messageBody:
You are right, I checked it last night. Not no-drop, but Lore. Wow,
it's only selling for about 150-200PP on Fennin. I tried to /auction
last night and no takers. I think I will just do the quest again for
the EXP, wasn't hard to do at all with the PoK. I have to take my hat
off to the folks who did this quest before PoK because they did a lot
of traveling...

--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Chirrichela Lomarcan"
<yssario@a...> wrote:
> The stein is Lore, but it is NOT nodrop. It's selling in the
Bazaar for as much as 500p on Thiluxe. I don't think it'd be selling
at ALL if it was Lore :)
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Biltilie Dwimmerlaik
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Sent: Monday, April 21, 2003 1:23 PM
> Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Re: Stein of Moggok Quest
>
>
> > Ok, I can answer my own question here. I found out from a GM
that the
> > stein is LORE/NO DROP. I have one in the bank that I bought
about a
>
> i know that it is LORE... but didn't think of it as the problem.
>
> is it really NO DROP, now? that's pretty new to me... i will
> check it the next time... i am not playing EQ very often in
> the last weeks...
